name: Excel Adult High School
description: Excel Adult High School is SFPL's new online high school program that provides adults the chance to earn a fully accredited high school diploma online. The program offers coursework in core subjects along with a variety of electives to suit your interests and career goals.
fullDescription: Excel Adult High School is SFPL's new online high school program that provides adults the chance to earn a fully accredited high school diploma online. The program offers coursework in core subjects along with a variety of electives to suit your interests and career goals.
whatTheyOffer: Excel Adult High School is SFPL's new online high school program that provides adults the chance to earn a fully accredited high school diploma online. The program offers coursework in core subjects along with a variety of electives to suit your interests and career goals.
howToGetIt: Begin by completing an online application to assess your readiness for the program. Visit this webpage: APPLY
